newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Robotics x2 modem upgrades available.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Robotics x2 modem upgrades available.

text.p: U.S. Robotics Corp said Tuesday the x2 upgrades for its Sportster 33.6 desktop modems are now available.
U.S. Robotics' x2 allows users to download information from the Internet and other networks at speeds of up to 56 kilobits per second, or nearly twice as fast today's common modems.
Sportster users can receive an upgrade from U.S. Robotics or through participating retailers.

Customers who purchased an eligible Sportster 33.6 desktop modem after August 15, 1996, can upgrade their modems for $60. Those who purchased Sportster modems between November 25, 1996 and January 4, 1997, and who registered for an upgrade, are eligible for a free upgrade directly from U.S. Robotics.
The company said upgrades for Sportster Voice and Sportster Winmodem products will be available later this month.
